This works great, thanks Lamas. The reason it is small is probably because of the "primitive" (relatively speaking) models/textures. Everything works well, no problems and no viruses/malware/etc. Just make sure to save using the emulator and not the actual game, because I used the latter and always loaded up at Link's house in the elf place :P

2 things, video wont play right, and were can i get a controller? help plz

Here's a list of where to get all graphic/audio/controller plugins for project 64

http://www.ngemu.com/n64/pj64.php?action=plugins

If the video doesnt work i just suggest trying different plug ins until you find one that works right.
